meanings.definition: The state or quality of being gassy.
meanings.sent1: Her gassiness was evident after she finished the entire plate of beans.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with gassiness after the beans were cooked.
meanings.sent3: His gassiness was so strong that even the dog avoided sitting next to him.
meanings.sent4: The gassiness in the room was like a cloud of embarrassment hanging over everyone.
meanings.sent5: The gassiness in the air was so thick you could almost see it.

meanings.definition: The tendency to produce gas in the digestive system.
meanings.sent1: The baby's gassiness often led to discomfort and crying.
meanings.sent2: Certain foods can increase gassiness in some people.
meanings.sent3: His gassiness was so bad that his friends nicknamed him 'Gas Man'.
meanings.sent4: The gassiness in the room was like a ticking time bomb waiting to explode.
meanings.sent5: The gassiness in the elevator was so overwhelming that people held their breath.
